attributes.action: Amend Number 10 e-petition rules to enable citizens to both sign to express either support OR opposition to submitted petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What use is a petition that only solicits support for an idea without facilitating those who wish to express their opposition?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
